name: Warm Darkness
description:
A 3D platformer runner developed using UE5 for Epic's MegaJam 2021 under theme "running out of space".

Platforms are exploding mines, they damage and impulse you out of space if you run on them, but they can boost you if you jump at the right time, and they deal no harm if you walk on them but remember this is a speed run!

Turrets try to take you down so evade them, or use mines in your favor!
